entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries or rain showers. High 6. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries changing to 40 percent chance of rain showers near noon. Snow level rising to 900 metres this afternoon. High 6. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PDT Saturday 25 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of showers. Low minus 2. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 40 percent chance of showers early this evening. Snow level 900 metres lowering to valley bottom this evening. Low minus 2. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PDT Saturday 25 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of showers. High 6. POP 30%
